thread.title: Teens arrested for robbery, assault in Capitol Hill park
thread.title_full: Teens arrested for robbery, assault in Capitol Hill park | www.kirotv.com

author: kirotv.com
title: Teens arrested for robbery, assault in Capitol Hill park
text:
Two teenagers were arrested after robbing and assaulting a man in a Capitol Hill park on Friday night.
The man was walking with two friends through Cal Anderson Park at 8:30 p.m.—when he was approached by a group of four juveniles, according to police.
One asked if he could use the victim’s phone. When the victim refused, the group attacked him—striking him in the head and further attacking him while one held the victim’s friends at knife-point.
. @SeattlePD : Teens arrested for robbery, assault in #CapitolHill park. Officers searched area near Cal Anderson Park, found 2 of 4 involved.
— KIRO 7 (@KIRO7Seattle) October 10, 2015 Officers searched the area after the attack was reported, and located two of the four involved.
One of the teens still had the victim’s phone in his pocket.
After the two were identified by the victim, they were booked into the Youth Services Center for investigation of robbery.
